Description: Bright lights were seen in the sky. Then followed what looked like people climbing down webbing into the house.
One square shaped object. Orange light in the middle. Was moving from South to the North and then to the West.
Object, burning up in the sky, breaking into two-three pieces, looked like a shooting star, but lower in sky. Turned green.
Orange ball in the sky, looked to be on fire. Was coming from an Easterly direction.
The object looked like a rocket. Had a white/orange glow.
Large blue, fluorescent, cigar shaped object. The object hovered and then moved away quickly.
Bright ball one end, about the size of a tennis ball, which was lit up. Behind it, a long tail tapered off with a smaller ball at the end of the object.
White ball of light. Was moving from West to East. Stopped and then went up into the sky vertically.
One, main object which was very bright. White in colour. Stationary
A huge fireball streaking across the skies of West Yorkshire.
One bright object. Looked star shaped. Rose fast in the sky and then disappeared.
One, spherical, with a reddish hue. Very bright and visible the whole time. Zig zagged across the sky, and very fast.
Circle of flashing white light, shaped like a bracelet. Moved over to the right, then left. Lights turned green and red. NW direction.
One object. Point source of light. White in colour. Stationary for about 10 minutes.
Four, round objects with orange lights. Very bright. Were moving from left to right.
One object, the same size as a star. Multi coloured/very bright. Fluctuating/glowing. Blackhole in centre. Rapid movement.
Bright orange ball in the sky, which 'hopped', before disappearing.
An unconventional silent craft, consisting of four red lights, flying low over the witness's house.
Looked like a bright star. Had a pulsating red and green light. Was stationary and then moved off.
Five flying saucers, that were orange in colour. They moved from East to West and then moved quickly over the sea.
A UFO was running parallel to the landing lanes of an East Midlands Jet. (Message taken 2 March 2001).
Large orange, tadpole shaped object with a long tail. Was followed shortly afterwards, by two more similar objects.
One circular object with flashing bright lights. Was at a high altitude.
Two large, shining golf ball like objects. They were moving in and out of the clouds.
One large, circular object and a number of small fragments, size of 10p pieces. White and a glow of red and blue. Very bright.
Big bright, white light. A smaller white light was then moving towards and away from the bigger white light.
The witness saw something that they could not identify, but it was not a plane.
Two, stationary cone shaped objects. One below each other. They were extremely bright.
A twinkling object in the air, in close proximity to a plane.
Very odd flashing light on a moving object, spinning above London, in the Westminster area.
One bright orange/red cigar shaped object that was seen over the sea.
Lights circling and then reversing direction every few minutes.
Glowing orange boomerang shaped object. Was moving very fast.
Series of neon lights (between neon and gold) in two lines - objects were boomerang shaped, in a V formation.
One silver cigar shaped object, that split into six small silver balls. They were travelling erratically, but remained as a group.
The object was a triangle shape with red flashing/alternating lights that went round the inside edges of the object.
The object looked like it was three times bigger than the size of a jumbo jet, like "a gigantic flying piece of street".
Very bright object, with an orange/yellow triangle behind it.
Very large object, falling like a shooting star. Flames were coming out of the back. (Could have been a satellite re-entering).
Large cylindrical object, white flowing light from the front and flames coming from the rear. Some noise, not loud.
One bright white object, hovering at first, then moving quickly.
Changing shape. Strong blue, green and red lights pulsating lights. Jumbo Jet sized.
Looked like a satellite re-entering, moving across the sky, then shot off like a shooting star.
Three bright lights forming a triangle. Hovering not moving.
Bright light lit up the curtains, and for a split second appeared to be heading for the window. Followed by a loud bang.
Massive object, about the size of two football pitches, triangular shape. Took off very fast.
Two round objects with legs, which were black and spinning.
Saw the biggest white light that the witness had ever seen before. It shot off across the sky and then disappeared.
Assumed object to be a shooting star at first. No trail behind.
One object. White brilliant light, flickering yellow and red. Extremely brighter than other stars around it. Moving from side to side.
There were 20-30 red flashing lights in the sky accompanied by a whirring noise.
Looked like an unusual aircraft, but with strange lights.
One large black triangular aircraft with three bright lights in a triangle formation. There was a rumbling sound.
Yellow light in a circular formation. The flash shot across the sky and the lights went out.
Large ball of light. Looked like a rocket. No sound generally, but at times, a slight whirring sound.
Saw a UFO, with a cluster of four bright lights in a ring shape on it. Three beams of white light shone upwards and then disappeared.
The witness had seen the object so clearly, that grooves and windows could be seen and no room for humans to fit within it.
The object was white in colour and 'chewy mint' shaped.
The object was a bright light and it was flashing and making engine noises.
One object with a bright, white flashing light, and was making engine noises.
Object looked like a comet at first, was quite bright and got lighter as they grew bigger.
Large flash of light which turned into a grey object descending over Cardiff bay, with trailing smoke behind it.
The object looked like a great bright light and was really intense, like a big ball of fire, rapidly moving towards the ground.
Looked like a big ball of fire coming down from the sky with a tail and sparks coming off of the end of it.
Bright orange/red colour object, rapidly and randomly changing direction, from East to West.
The object was a silver disc, with solar panels, but turned out to be an ATR 42 - twin propeller, Euromanx aeroplane.
A group of lights were seen and then a buzzing noise was heard.
A bright light was seen heading towards the earth through the clouds.
Looked like an orange ball of light, like a big star in the sky and it had spiderish legs.
Light bulbs in the sky. (From the Scarborough Evening Post).
Witnessed a V shaped object, which had bright lights, and sounded like bees.
A group of lights in the sky were moving erratically to the West. They just seemed to fade away.
A massive light. The object was shaped like an iron. Didn't move at all.
Object seen in the sky, but then the witness said it could have been a meteorite.
Saw one strange light, that stayed there for about an hour. It dimmed, then got brighter again.
The object was star shaped and all the colours of the rainbow and was dancing around.
The witness said that there was a descending white light. Then rotating beams of light going upwards from the ground.
Said there were strange lights in the sky at a very high altitude.
Three golden orbs seen hovering in the sky for an hour, moving in a triangle formation.
Three objects were seen in the sky. The objects appeared to be orange in colour.
Three balls of fire in the sky. They keep circling and then lining up.
Bright, white lights that were moving in semi circles.
Three white circles going clockwise then anti-clockwise.
Diamond shaped craft/object. The object had an unusual powerful, white/yellow, rotating beacon/searchlight at its rear.
A photograph of a dot in the sky was taken, and when magnified, looked like some strange craft.
Dome shaped static object, with lights running up and down the dome, with another light swaying to and fro beneath.
Three silver dots/craft were seen very high up in the sky.
There was a massive bang and then two large fire balls were seen moving from East to West. They were very bright.
Hundreds of glowing lights moving North East in a line formation. They were moving in rows of three.

A curved, diamond shaped object, passed over the witnesses head, going North. It 
was travelling very fast.

Five orange/red glows were seen in the sky. They were moving quite fast. They 
were in formation and then parted and disappeared.
There were over fifty lights floating in the sky. They were red/orange in colour.

Two strange objects, followed by three others. They were bright and fire coloured. 
Were spinning and moving very fast across the sky.

Six, strange lights which were yellow, but had orange in the centre. They were 
moving in a staggered formation across the sky, below the cloud base.
A cigar shaped object, with flashing lights. It was hovering.

Two clusters of amber/orange and white lights in triangular formations. They 
travelled horizontally in a North Westerly direction. They moved like a cork that 
was bobbing on water.

Two strange beams of light. They were very 
bright. They were hovering above some trees. 
The lights then moved towards the borders of 
Staffordshire.

A dull, red object was travelling at high speed 
and stayed on route.

The object was triangular in shape, with a 
yellow light in each corner and a red light in 
the centre. The yellow lights were pulsating 
quickly.

Eight, faint orange lights were flying in the sky. 
They suddenly disappeared when a plane was 
in it's view.

A long, thick, red streak shot across the sky. 
There was a silver ball of light attached to the 
front of it. It was rather large. The ball then got 
bigger and burst.

Two lights were briefly seen, before they 
disappeared into a huge cloud. They looked 
like bright orange stars.

A UFO that was shaped like a fiery star. It flew 
through the sky and then disappeared.

An object moved from North to West, then 
disappeared after moving towards the East.

There was a distant bright light, like a huge 
star. A wide shaped object too, with white and 
coloured lights across it. It then disappeared 
overhead.

Two bright balls of light. One of the balls 
looked like it was chasing and trying to 
overtake an aircraft. The other ball just burst 
as it was moving and disappeared.

An object was travelling at high speed. It 
appeared to be round like a football. It was 
travelling from South East to North East. It 
then disappeared.

There was one lit up circle and then 24 
appeared all spaced. They were all in the 
same line of path and moving at the same 
speed.

Two spheres passed rapidly by, moving 
Northwards.

Three very low, very bright lights were 
travelling in formation, then breaking off and 
doing acrobatics. Then a large globe-like 
object appeared and was changing colours in 
a pulsating way.

The craft had bright green lights and a blue 
light that was moving quickly through the 
trees. It was very large and was moving 
extremely fast. It was silent.

Two large orange lights in the sky, were flying 
East rather quickly. One light flew around the 
other one, then they both moved away North, 
at a higher speed.

An object, the shape of a chewing gum pack, 
black in colour and had three circles of lights 
underneath it, emitting a dull orange light. 
Was about 150 feet long and 50 feet wide.

There was quite a large flashing object, just 
hanging in the air, quite high up. Underneath 
the object was an orange/red luminating light.

Very fast, intense flashes. Then one of the 
flashes formed into a ball.

The object was cigar shaped, was 80ft long 
and 30ft tall. Was orange in colour and looked 
illuminated. It had a rear, bright white light. It 
made a sharp right turn then disappeared.

A UFO, that looked like a yellowy light. The 
object was quite near and fairly low down in 
the sky. There was no sound.

There were fifteen UFOs/bright lights coming 
down from the Downs. They were travelling at 
very fast speeds.

An orange/red ball shot into the sky from a 
North Easterly direction. It travelled at terrific 
speed climbing all the time, then faded and 
disappeared. There was no noise.

There were fifteen lights moving across the 
sky about half a mile away. They were red 
and flickering. Then three lights formed a 
triangle shape. They were moving horizontally 
from left to right.

Six objects in two lines of three, one line 
above the other.  Emitted a very strong yellow 
orange light before disappearing in the 
distance to the west.

Four or five bright lights moving across sky 
north of Carlisle. Orange in colour. Retained a 
constant altitude then dissappeared from view 
heading westwards.

Bigger than a helicopter, 250 metres up, 
silent, with something like a bar coming off it. 
30 seconds later flew off over the sea followed 
closely by a helicopter

There was a whole procession of lights in the 
sky. Big eight orange balls with a red, flaming 
triangle in the centre of all of them. There was 
no noise.

Two orbs, that were quite big, were seen 
dropping through the sky and disappearing 
behind some trees.

Lights in groups of 3 or 4 but not in a line. 
They weere an orange/yellow colour. Watched 
for 30 minutes. They made no sound

There were some large objects in the sky. 
There was also a constant red light heading 
West. The objects were bigger than a plane.

A diamond shaped red light came towards him from the sea. Rear 
end of diamond was a blue light. It was incredibly hot as it passed 
overhead. No sound.

A silver disc shaped light seen for two minutes. Witness was in his 
lounge.
A bright object travelling very fast overhead. Not a plane.
Something lit up the sky. There was smoke in the sky afterwards.

We keep getting flown over by aliens galore. They are dropping 
germs and we keep getting colds. Please send the RAF or USAF to 
stop them.

Five orange lights high in the sky over the house. Disappeared into 
the atmosphere

White on outer edges. 7-800ft long. Moving very fast from North to 
South.
Strange object seen when he developed photographs he had taken.

Ten orange orbs. Orbs had slightly pulsating orange lights. Not like 
navigation lights. Made no noised.

Six lights, some red, some orange and some white all travelling in 
the same direction. It was either one big object or six single objects. 
All travelling in the same direction.

Strange object in the sky. Bright orange in colour with intensity of 
fire. Like a huge hanglider.
Lights in the sky. Definitely not a plane. Very strange.

A peculiar bright light. The object was spherical shaped like a 
satellite. It moved West to East very quickly. Definitely not a 
satellite, helicopter or light aircraft.

Bright orange lights continuously going up and down on the horizon. 
Heading East in the direction of Frome or Wiltshire.

An orange/yellow object moving NW to SE. Followed by three more. 
No navigation lights and they made no sound. Not that high up. 
Disappeared into the distance quicker than they arrived.

A swarm of about 100 flashing white lights, high in the sky moving 
from the NE to SE. Very quick and keeping equidistant and of equal 
speed. Disappeared about 45 degrees above the horizon. The 
swarm moved in an arc of 40 degrees in about 10 seconds.

A wide pear drop shaped translucent green light with a small tail of 
light. Moved in NW direction. Made no noise and vanished after a 
few seconds.

Three orange lights, evenly spaced and moving at the same speed. 
Gradually disappeared after five minutes. Heading from SE to NW.

A red fire ball travelling at extreme speed. It made no sound. 
Heading from Coventry to Leominster.
Two very bright glowing orange lights moving at very high speed.

A constant light travelling West to East. Very erratic, wobbling off 
course then just disappeared.

A group of very bright orange objects heading NW to SE at a 
consistent speed and low altitude. There was a group of 15 followed 
by groups of 2-3 and 3-4 over a five minute period. They made no 
noise.

Three bright lights heading in the same direction some 2 minutes 
apart. The 3rd light disintegrated and spilt up.

A massive orange thing. Going so fast it passed a plane going 
towards RAF Lyneham.

A bright orange ball of fire. It was quite high up in the sky over the 
house. It was changing colour and disappeared straight into the sky.

Very bright white light. Its trail followed it for half an hour heading 
towards Brough.

Looked like a squashed balloon and had no wings. Rounder at the 
front and pointed at the back. It had no lights at the front but 2-3 at 
the back, one red, one red and flashing and one white/green. 
Witness heard the noise first which grew louder.
Two parallel lights. Red or orange lights in the sky.

A very bright orange glow. Moved about the speed of an airliner, 
heading south to north.
A big ball of fire, like a star. It decreased in size over two minutes.

Several orange lights, same colour and brightness of street lights. 
Three were close together and the others were in a horizontal line.

A Light. Moved past very slowly then shot off at phenomenal speed. 
It was round but twice it changed into a cone shape. 300-400ft up.

Four glowing objects coming from southwest and then turned north. 
They were glowing duller and brighter, then disappeared.
Two yellow objects like giant sparklers heading North to South.

A orange ball in the sky, travelling very quickly then stopped and 
faded away.

An oval shaped glowing red object, in two dimensions. It spun in one 
direction then reversed and swung in the other.

Lights rising from the ground into the sky, much like debris from a 
fire. However lights were too intense to be a fire. Seen in the 
direction of the North Downs from Maidstone.

A bright orange light. Too bright for a Chinese lantern. The light 
looked electrical not a flame. Travelled in a straight line at a steady 
speed. Travelled East to West with the wind. Made no noise. It was 
about the size of a quarter moon.

Four flaming balloons that disappeared over the horizon fairly 
quickly. Was not very high.

Three objects like fireballs falling to earth. They were glowing and 
orange. There was one large object and two smaller ones which 
converged together and rose into the atmosphere until they faded 
away.

A UFO. It was a "glowing ball of something or other". Definitely not a 
plane.

A bright circular amber light, the size of a 2p coin. It was moving 
very slowly in a straight line but once it flew over the witnesses 
house it accelerated away very very quickly into the distance. It 
made no noise and left no vapour trail.

Two clusters of bright lights. They were stationary for a while then 
the first group of 15 headed towards Woodbridge followed by the 
second cluster of 6-7 lights. They were very high up. They made no 
sound.

50-100 objects moving together in the same direction. They were 
helicopter sized but made no noise.
A light at about 1000ft. It split in two and flew away.

Two very bright orange lights that appeared to get closer to the car 
then just hung in the sky. Five minutes later a second bright orange 
light with red glow seen then disappeared. A third light then hung in 
the sky and disappeared after five minutes.

Six bright orange/red lights in formation. They climbed like balloons 
and made no sound. A sphere like a balloon appeared at the side 
and then another.

Eight alien aircraft seen just above helicopter height travelling SW 
to NE. There was a humming sound. They looked like they were 
"eyeing the place up".

12-15 objects. Not like normal fixed wing aircraft, more like bright 
orange lights. Moving West at indeterminate height. Objects entered 
cloud then turned around.

A red light followed by 7 others. They came from the West, flew 
overhead and disappeared. Definitely not aircraft.

Some 30 orange lights heading from Birmingham Airport towards 
Coleshill.

Three very bright orange lights. Fairly large and moving much faster 
than an aircrfat. They disappeared. Then two lights appeared from 
the South. The lights appeared co-ordinated. They were not aircraft.

A dormant blue light which changed colour many times over the 
hour it was witnessed. At first it was moving steadily and then it 
stopped in  mid air. Then started moving from left to right. A white 
beam could be seen shining down from it. It had red lights.

Two objects, one with a brighter light. The second one was behind it 
and had a dimmer light. No navigation lights. Not normal. Reluctant 
to say it was a UFO - perhaps it is a plane.

Five orange bright lights. Half a mile distance between each one. 
Took photos.

Fast, shiny discs. Lower and faster than a plane, not a plane or 
helicopter. Sphere, brilliant light.

Two sightings. First at 12:30 (bright light), second at 01:30 (flashing 
green).

Having a BBQ with some friends when saw an orange fireball about 
to crash two gardens away, but on checking it was now high in the 
sky about half mile away. 3-5 minutes later another object appeared 
then a third spherical object with a leg protruding.

A very bright white light like a star. It moved south then double 
backed on itself and was joined by another light. The lights danced 
round each other then split and moved off in different directions. The 
light suddenly disappeared.

Seven bright orange lights in a straight line. Only two lights were in 
view at any time. As the last two came a white moon ball flew over 
at double the speed of the orange lights. Thirty minutes later six 
white balls in a triangle formation were seen.

Three huge orange lights. First and second objects moving at speed 
of an aircraft. Third object moving much faster as if trying to catch 
up.

Saw a meteor shower which contained something he could not 
explain.

Bright light shone through the window. Saw three lights size of a 
basket ball moving up/down and rotating on own axis. Seemed to 
loose power after 30 seconds and vanished.

No flashing lights, orange looking object. Looked like it was 
hovering, flew towards observer's car and faded slowly into the 
distance.

Pair of "lanterns" directly overhead, slightly faster than a plane, 
faster than a satellite, slower than a meteor.

One light, joined by another, hovering over the village. No noise. 
One light no longer there, the other disappeared. Like a lightbulb 
with an orange top

Very bright light, stops and spins slowly, moves right and left, as if 
looking for something or taking photos, long beams of light. No 
sound.
Two bright orange lights. Witnessed for about five minutes.

Emitting a large bright orange light much larger than normal lights 
on a plane/helicopter, travelling in an arc with no sound. After 10 
mins light became dimmer and appeared to gain height, light now 
size as normal aircraft light and disappeared.

A bright orange object. Above cloud level. Travelling at a high rate 
of knots. Came inland from the coast over Exmouth and headed off 
towards Woodbury and Taunton.

Was carrying a camera, as is her usual practice, saw a pinpoint, a 
silver dot that was clearly a UFO.

Three red lights in the shape of a triangle with the nose moving 
forward, not a usual aircraft, suspect it was a UFO.

Circular shape in with a mixture of stars, one was getting brighter 
and then dimmer and disappearing for a short number of minutes. 
Another red light hovered around the object. Camera on phone 
would not pick anything up.
Came over top of field - red- flew very quickly like a shooting star.

Round shape - lightening then darkening with a dark shape behind it.  
No engine noise.
Saw a bright light heading towards Essex - bright light standing still.

Orange ball going in a straight line.  No visible trail.  No smoke or 
noise. Appeared to be getting smaller burning itself up.
Saw what looked like a flying log, blue with a white edge.

Terrestrials seen coming from King's Lynn towards Swaffham, 
Norfolk.

Two glowing sphere/domed -shaped objects followed each in South 
East direction.  Completely silent and not flashing at all, as you 
would expect from aircraft.

One object rising in the sky. Semi circle outline. Flames glowing 
orange/red.  Flickering round the edge. At first thought it was a 
firework, then it disappeared.

Orange lights following each other in same direction. No noise, no 
flashing lights, same trajectory. In vicinity of Lyneham radar.  Some 
lights disappeared.

Saw eight orange single lights in the sky. Lights were very clear, 
single bright orange spot, which travelled at constant speed slowly 
higher into the eastern atmosphere. At first four lights in close 
proximity followed by four more with approx one minute.

Approx 10 orange lights flying over. First eight were going at a 
steady, slow rate, three of which merged into a triangle formation, 
separated then disappeared. Two others appeared about a minute or 
so travelling faster and disappeared at same area of sky.

Saw a vertical cylinder, silvery colour and underneath was a great 
bright yellow, fiery glow.  Watched the object for about 20 minutes.

Six bright orange lights - not flashing - silent. After a few minutes 
there was another one.

Saw a very bright light - looking south to right of the moon.  It was 
very large.  There were four or five bright lights.

Moving very fast SE to North and watched object for about 10 
seconds. Thought at first it was a star or a plane.

Brilliant and dazzling pure white horizontal ring of light.  It appeared 
to be perfectly still in the sky above the houses and was totally 
silent.  Object was hovering over the Belle Vue Crescent area.

Eight, orange UFOs, shone brightly, travelling at speed, low in the 
sky. Objects came across one by one with approx 20 seconds 
between them. They stopped over the reservoir changed direction at 
approx 90 deg angle towards Holmfirth.  No noise.

Black sphere. Bobbing about half a mile away . Covered with a 
phospherous chemical cloud.  It goes light grey. Flash of lightening 
then re-appears. Some of the clouds light up.  Various sightings 
20:30 and 12:15.
Saw a UFO it was not a plane it disappeared very quickly.

An intense, bright white light seen between the flight path of Gatwick 
and Heathrow.

Seven objects. One group of three, followed by one group of four. 
Orange, large no distinct shape. Bright, no noise.
